content.body: Is the https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/common-microsyntaxes.html#rules-for-parsing-floating-point-number-values algorithm known to differ in any way from the behavior of [`strtod`](https://en.cppreference.com/w/c/string/byte/strtof)?
content.formatted_body: Is the https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/common-microsyntaxes.html#rules-for-parsing-floating-point-number-values algorithm known to differ in any way from the behavior of strtod?

content.body: I assume you could find any number of differences if you looked, if those are even consistent between platforms
